StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCommandRecruiters]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @BeginDate date.me, @EndDate date.me, @OrgId int )
AS
SELECT n.NWA_ID,n.rowguid AS NwaRowGuid ,SHIP_ID AS CommandRecruiterId ,COALESCE(RTRIM(p.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(p.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS Name ,COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS RecruiterName ,CASE WHEN et.ID = 127 then 1 WHEN et.ID = 128 then 4 WHEN et.ID = 129 then 2 WHEN et.ID = 130 then 3 end as CommandRecruiterCategoryId ,et.[Type] AS CommandRecruiterCategory --,s.CurrentRankCode ,pg.Rank_Code AS CurrentRankCode ,e.StartDate as StartDate ,e.EndDate as EndDate ,s.DateDueHome ,s.DepartureDate ,s.SHIP_DATE AS ShipDate
FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[NWA]n inner join [MCRISS].[dbo].[CONTRACT] c on c.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID inner join [dbo].[SHIPPER] s on s.CONTRACT_ID = c.CONTRACT_ID inner join [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventSubject] es on es.SubjectId = n.rowguid inner join [RSSOSS].[USMC].[Event]e on e.ID = es.EventId inner join [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventType] et on et.ID = e.EventTypeId INNER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] p ON p.PERSON_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs ON n.NWA_ID = cs.NWA_ID AND cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID IN ( SELECT MAX(CS2.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs2 WHERE cs.NWA_ID = cs2.NWA_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] rp ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] rcrtr ON rcrtr.PERSON_ID = rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN usmc.CommandRecruiterCategory crc ON crc.CommandRecruiterCategoryId = s.CommandRecruiterCategoryId LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Marine m ON m.Marine_ID = p.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Pay_Grade pg ON pg.Pay_Grade_Code = m.Present_Grade_Code WHERE (e.StartDate <= @EndDate) AND (e.EndDate>= @BeginDate) AND ((cs.STATUS_TYPE + cs.STATUS_CODE + cs.DISPOSITION_CODE = 'ECN') or (cs.STATUS_TYPE + cs.STATUS_CODE + cs.DISPOSITION_CODE = 'ECP')) AND n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @OrgId AND ( (et.ID = 130 AND n.ProvenPerformer = 1) OR et.ID = 127 OR et.ID = 129 OR et.ID = 128)
